description.value:
Primary Energy: Space 5 (protective barrier against energy) Supporting Energy: Time 3 (duration 10 minutes) Range: self, touch Duration: 10 minutes Total Cost: 8 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Target at touch gains Resistance (+4 DR) against one chosen damage type (fire, cold, acid, lightning, thunder). Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 minute, 2 = full effect, 3 = 1 hour, 4 = 1 hour (+8 DR), 5 = 4 hours (+8 DR)

R
